description: This boy got himself into a pretty hopeless situation. He took a quick loan once and got a taste for it. He enjoyed living his life at the future´s expense. And his girlfriend was fine with it. Now they both faced eviction from their home and a real threat of a court trial. When I arrived, the boy was almost desperate. He knew he messed up. I could see sadness in his beautiful eyes when he was explaining why my help was so urgently needed. It was so touching that I got a boner. I couldn´t lend him money but I still wanted to help. He was not very much against my naughty way of helping as he had no time to waste. His debts were due soon and I was his last hope. I let him work the debt off and he did exactly what he was told.
title: Debt Dandy 263
